resources.string: How long will you be staying ?
আমি আপনার আইডি দেখতে পারে,দয়া করে?
Could you please fill out this form?
আপনি কি এই ফর্মটি পূরণ করতে পারেন?

About me:\n The word computer refers to an object that can accept some input and produce some output. In fact, the human brain itself is a sophisticated computer, though, is to describe an electronic device containing a microprocessor.
